title: T206 tough & rare backs for trade
author: PEEK enterprises

posts.post_title: T206 tough & rare backs for trade
posts.post_content:
I have a list of approximately (100) backs ranging from Sovereign/Old Mill to Broad Leaf/Pied Factory 42, grades Authentic to 6, several HOF'ers included, all graded by SGC/PSA.

I am "trading" only at this time for my wants/needs which include:

- T206 tougher backs that I need.
- Evers Portrait Old Mill.
- Tinker Portrait Hindu.
- T206 Chesbro PSA 6
- T206 McGraw Port no Cap PSA 6
- T206 Adkins PSA 6
- SGC/PSA Ruth, Gehrig, Mantle, Jackie Robinson.
- 50's & 60's HOF rookie cards graded PSA 6+
- 1963 Rose rookies in PSA/SGC 3+

Email for list (excel spreadsheet) - [url]ppgustafson@yahoo.com[/url]

Thanks
